segments.text: Hey , let ’ s pull over and look at that house over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that looks great ! Is it on our Open House list ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is on our list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it looks great from the curb . Let ’ s go on inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s sign the registry . The realtor looks kind of busy right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , let ’ s go check out the kitchen next .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh look , they have some refreshments in here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make sure that you pick up a flyer with the information about the home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does it say how much they are asking for this house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it seems to have been discounted from two hundred and thirty-five thousand to two hundred and twenty-five thousand
segments.speaker: S2
